behaviors.desc:
Polymer.IronFitBehavior fits an element in another element using `max-height` and `max-width`, and
optionally centers it in the window or another element.

The element will only be sized and/or positioned if it has not already been sized and/or positioned
by CSS.

CSS properties               | Action
-----------------------------|-------------------------------------------
`position` set               | Element is not centered horizontally or vertically
`top` or `bottom` set        | Element is not vertically centered
`left` or `right` set        | Element is not horizontally centered
`max-height` or `height` set | Element respects `max-height` or `height`
`max-width` or `width` set   | Element respects `max-width` or `width`

jsdoc.description:
Polymer.IronFitBehavior fits an element in another element using `max-height` and `max-width`, and
optionally centers it in the window or another element.

The element will only be sized and/or positioned if it has not already been sized and/or positioned
by CSS.

CSS properties               | Action
-----------------------------|-------------------------------------------
`position` set               | Element is not centered horizontally or vertically
`top` or `bottom` set        | Element is not vertically centered
`left` or `right` set        | Element is not horizontally centered
`max-height` or `height` set | Element respects `max-height` or `height`
`max-width` or `width` set   | Element respects `max-width` or `width`
jsdoc.orig:
*
Polymer.IronFitBehavior fits an element in another element using `max-height` and `max-width`, and
optionally centers it in the window or another element.

The element will only be sized and/or positioned if it has not already been sized and/or positioned
by CSS.

CSS properties               | Action
-----------------------------|-------------------------------------------
`position` set               | Element is not centered horizontally or vertically
`top` or `bottom` set        | Element is not vertically centered
`left` or `right` set        | Element is not horizontally centered
`max-height` or `height` set | Element respects `max-height` or `height`
`max-width` or `width` set   | Element respects `max-width` or `width`

@demo demo/index.html
@polymerBehavior

properties.name: autoFitOnAttach
properties.desc: Set to true to auto-fit on attach.

jsdoc.description: Set to true to auto-fit on attach.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * Set to true to auto-fit on attach.

properties.name: center
properties.desc:
Centers horizontally and vertically if not already positioned. This also sets
`position:fixed`.

jsdoc.description:
Centers horizontally and vertically if not already positioned. This also sets
`position:fixed`.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Centers horizontally and vertically if not already positioned. This also sets
     * `position:fixed`.

properties.name: constrain
properties.desc:
Constrains the size of the element to the window or `fitInfo` by setting `max-height`
and/or `max-width`.

jsdoc.description:
Constrains the size of the element to the window or `fitInfo` by setting `max-height`
and/or `max-width`.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Constrains the size of the element to the window or `fitInfo` by setting `max-height`
     * and/or `max-width`.

properties.name: fit
properties.desc: Fits and optionally centers the element into the window, or `fitInfo` if specified.

jsdoc.description: Fits and optionally centers the element into the window, or `fitInfo` if specified.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Fits and optionally centers the element into the window, or `fitInfo` if specified.

properties.name: refit
properties.desc:
Equivalent to calling `resetFit()` and `fit()`. Useful to call this after the element,
the window, or the `fitInfo` element has been resized.

jsdoc.description:
Equivalent to calling `resetFit()` and `fit()`. Useful to call this after the element,
the window, or the `fitInfo` element has been resized.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Equivalent to calling `resetFit()` and `fit()`. Useful to call this after the element,
     * the window, or the `fitInfo` element has been resized.

properties.name: resetFit
properties.desc:
Resets the target element's position and size constraints, and clear
the memoized data.

jsdoc.description:
Resets the target element's position and size constraints, and clear
the memoized data.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Resets the target element's position and size constraints, and clear
     * the memoized data.

properties.name: sizingTarget
properties.desc:
The element that will receive a `max-height`/`width`. By default it is the same as `this`,
but it can be set to a child element. This is useful, for example, for implementing a
scrolling region inside the element.

jsdoc.description:
The element that will receive a `max-height`/`width`. By default it is the same as `this`,
but it can be set to a child element. This is useful, for example, for implementing a
scrolling region inside the element.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * The element that will receive a `max-height`/`width`. By default it is the same as `this`,
       * but it can be set to a child element. This is useful, for example, for implementing a
       * scrolling region inside the element.
       * @type {!Element}

properties.name: _discoverInfo
properties.desc: Memoize information needed to position and size the target element.

jsdoc.description: Memoize information needed to position and size the target element.
jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Memoize information needed to position and size the target element.
